name: Space Bowling (KuMa4aN)
description:
What could be better than a game of bowling and space?

The game was made for a game jam!

Bowling in space,but instead of balls - planets! And  each planet has its own peculiarity!
Just relax and have fun!


Assets that were used:
  • Planets
  • Kegels
  • GUI
  • Background music
  • Explosion sounds
  • SkyBox
